ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: Try to use the message board for bards, not promoting your guild. So one guy has a problem, and you can t please everybody. But try to help bards out by tips,
ygData.messageBody:
Try to use the message board for bards, not promoting your guild. So
one guy has a problem, and you can't please everybody. But try to help
bards out by tips, tactics and quest hints, not guild promotion. You
may be a good guild, I don't know, but please try to keep it
uncommercialized. Thankyou.

For instance, any woodelf bard can give 4 spiderling silks to the guild
leader in kelethin and get a hand drum. This quest can be done over and
over and the drums can be sold for about 3-4 gold. Not to shabby for
newbies.
